alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Lorain; Medina; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 19 at 1:33PM EST until January 20 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Lorain, Cuyahoga, Medina and Summit counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is ongoing within a band of lake-enhanced snow currently located across the eastern half of Cuyahoga County into northern Summit County. This band may pivot west into Medina and eastern Lorain counties later this afternoon into this evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
